block1_text.en: Visit us and check it out!

block2_text.en: Tell us what you like and we will get it for you!
block2_text.hr: Recite nam što vam se sviđa i nabaviti ćemo to za vas!

block3_title.en: Can you sell our toys? Yes!
block3_title.hr: Možete li prodati naše igračke? Da!

block3_text.en: Have your little webshop? Feel free to re-sell our toys! It's a win-win situation!
block3_text.hr: Imate svoju malu internet trgovinu? Slobodno preprodavajte naše igračke! To je Win-win situacija!
